select field_id, template_id, required, default_value, custom_data, cft.id as id, cf.name as name, cf.type as type, cf.remark as remark, cf.`system` as system, cf.options as options from custom_field_template cft inner join custom_field cf on cft.field_id = cf.id
where cft.template_id = #{request.templateId}
